abstract: BHP Billiton was not ruling out adding cash to its all-share hostile offer for rival Rio Tinto, BHP’s chief executive, Marius Kloppers, told CNBC.

headline.main: BHP Won’t Rule Out Adding Cash to Rio Bid, Chief Says
